content.rendered:
Directed by Aparnaa Singh.

Written by Anushka Rajan.

Cast Naseeruddin Shah(Parabjeet Walia). Arshad Warsi(Arjun Mishra). Divya Dutta(Ramandeep Braitch). Sharad Kelkar(Paddy Sharma). Sagarika Ghatge(Maya Singh). Rajesh Sharma(Jeetu Arora). Rumana Molla(Riya Walia). Nikhil Pandey(Anirudh Dutt). Prashantt Guptha(Bhagat Singh). Diwakar Kumar(Jagat Sinha). Harmeet Kaur(Supreet Singh). Savita Bhatti(Harmeet Braich). Prince Soni(Sunday Singh). Rohan Shah(Ricky Bhullar). Radhika Bangia(Ruby Gill). Rajeev Mehta(Abdul Hasan (as Rajiv Mehta)). Mehtaab(Nanu Hasan). Lubhani Attwal(Doll Chadha). Seerat Kaur(Mitali Sharma)

Language Hindi.

Producers Suraj Agnihotri. Bhatia Kanuj. Falguni Patel. Sachin Patel. Anushka Rajan. Abhishek Sharma. Prince Soni.

Production Irada Entertainment.
